signin_forgot_pw_guide: Your password is encrypted and cannot be accessed, even by administrators. It can only be reset.
signin_forgot_pw_guide2: A password reset email will be sent to your registered ID. Follow the instructions to get a temporary password.
signin_forgot_pw_guide3: If you don't receive the email, check your spam folder.

Email sent for password reset.

select_profile_member_guide: You can add your family members

ID or password does not match.
Please check again and enter.
error_password_exceeded:
The password attempts have exceeded five times.

error_wrong_id: The ID does not exist. Please verify or sign up.
error_dormant_id:
Your ID is more than one year old.

signin_logo_slogan: Stay Connected, feeling pulse of home
signin_sign_up_complete_guide2:
There was a temporary password in the email you signed up with.

error_email_already_used_guide: This email is already registered. Please Sign In or use a different email. If you forgot your password, you can reset it.
error_email_not_found_guide: No account is associated with this email. Please verify the email is correct for account creation or to receive a temporary password.
signin_agree_11years_guide: If a minor is under the age of 10, the consent of the parental authority of the child is required.
signin_manage_account_guide: After signing in, you can manage your account information by navigating to Menu > Profile.
signin_agreement2: Moni would like your consent for required fields.

signin_reg_check_mailbox: Check validation code in your mail box

history_no_member_guide2: Go to Home > Member List > Add Member
history_add_location_guide: Go to Home > Add Sensing Location
home_overview_guide: Easily monitor the latest activity, connected devices, and member at your home in real-time.
home_overview_guide2: Track motion and no motion at each location within your home. Get a detailed timeline to see when and where activity happens.
home_overview_guide3: Monitor who's currently home and review past activity. Connect personal devices to each family member for detailed tracking.
common_data_required: The necessary information to use the service properly.
home_latest_motion_guide: The latest motion was detected within the last 24 hours from the current time.
home_connected_device_guide: The number of devices connected to your main router.
home_present_member_guide: The current number of member present at your place.

After your password is changed, you must

menu_clear_cache_guide: Clearing the cache will sign you out. You’ll need to sign in again to continue. Do you want to proceed?
menu_service_select_guide: If not set as default, it will be applied in family mode.
menu_service_select_guide2: Family and Elderly Mode cannot be applied at the same time.

At least one personal device selection

member_random_mac_off_guide3: Tap the gear icon associated with your network.

member_why_personal_device_guide3: Notifications for the selected profile or user will be sent to.

member_set_personal_device_guide: To receive push notifications for both motion and no-motion activities concerning your family.
member_manage_account_later_guide: You can manage your account information by navigating to Menu > Profile.
member_delete_guide: Are you sure you want to delete this member? Recovery is impossible.

permission_guide2: You can always adjust your permissions in your phone's

place_scan_qr_guide3: Have the QR code on the back of your router ready to scan.
place_label_guide: Check this label on your router

Are you sure you want to sign out?

place_add_guide: Each Place can have only one main router (Wi-Fi device).
place_add_guide2: The Place name is the name of your router.
place_exit_page_guide: Are you sure you want to exit this page without confirming new changes?
place_add_location_guide2: Please select a sensing device from below.
common_delete_guide: Are you sure you want to delete it?
place_add_location_guide3: Check the conditions below to add a sensing device.
place_add_location_guide4: Verify the compatibility of your sensing device. Connecting it to our router enhances family security by expanding the sensing locations.
place_add_location_guide5: Devices should be fixed in place to register as sensing devices.
place_add_location_guide7: What are the differences between Sensing Location and Device?
place_add_location_guide8: Devices with Wi-Fi capability can collect sensing information by connecting to our main router. These devices are called 'sensing devices'.
place_no_sensing_device_guide:
There is no sensing device around the router
in your place.
place_weak_device_guide: Devices with weak WiFi strength can not be selected.
place_delete_guide: Are you sure you want to delete this place?
place_delete_guide2: If you delete this, all associated data will be permanently removed.
place_delete_guide3: Additionally, you must have at least one place registered. Therefore, after deleting this place, you will be unable to use this app until you add a new place.
error_wrong_place_name: The Place name is not correct.
place_no_device_guide: There is no device. Please check if the device has been connected to the main router.

place_enter_password_guide: Up to 30 characters, including numbers, letters, & special characters

error_duplicated_profile_guide: The same profile is already in use. The previous user will be signed out if you sign in with this profile.
report_family_activity_guide: Total time of motion detected data in your place
report_spend_time_guide: Time the family spent together in your home
report_spend_time_more: Your family spent about {1} more together than the day before!
report_spend_time_less: Your family spent about {1} less together than the day before!

onboarding_guide_2: Check Your Children's and Parent's Presence and Absence Everywhere.
alarm_not_access_guide: Registering a personal device is essential for receiving notifications and accessing alarms settings.
place_scan_qr_guide4: Make sure your main router’s internet status is working.
add_all_sensinglocation_detailed:
The installed router's Place has been assigned.
You need at least one Extender for sensing to work. It is being automatically detected.
add_all_sensinglocation_addinfo2: The extender must be connected to your main router.
add_all_sensinglocation_addinfo3: We don't support third-party devices as sensing location devices yet.
add_all_sensinglocation_noextender_detai: It appears that there is no extender near {1}. If only the main router is available, you and your family's motion detection will require an extender to be connected to the main router.
add_all_sensinglocation_norouter_detail1: Check if the main router’s power is on
add_all_sensinglocation_norouter_detail3: If you turn on the main router now, it may take 1 to 2 minutes to connect.
add_all_sensinglocation_quit_guide: Are you sure you want to quit adding the sensing location and go to the profile creation page?
add_all_sensinglocation_detected_detail: An extender has been detected! Once it's connected, sensing will begin immediately.
add_all_sensinglocation_extender_error: If an extender is unavailable, it can be added later once its status is restored. Alternatively, if it is powered on, you can change its position and refresh this page.
set_sensitivity_detail: Applying sensitivity to the Place will also apply it to all Sensing Locations below. To adjust individually, use the sliders.
set_sensitivity_quit_guide: Are you sure you want to quit Set Sensitivity Level and go to the profile creation page?
set_sensitivity_success_guide: Adding your extender as sensing location is complete. now the motion sensing is starting in your place.
set_sensitivity_large_guide: Large movements (running, jumping) in the Place are detected, and notifications are triggered.
set_sensitivity_regular_guide: Regular movements (walking, gestures, sitting) in the Place are detected, and notifications are triggered.
set_sensitivity_small_guide: Small movements and changes in the Place are sensitively detected, and notifications occur frequently.
set_sensitivity_small_custom: The sensitivity level for each Sensing Location is set individually.
create_profile_continue_guide: You've already added your place! You have only one step left to start Moni, the best family safety management app.
home_add_allmembers_guide: Add your family members in one step, easily check each person’s status, and safeguard the love and safety of your family.
home_add_allsensing_guide: Moni has found {1} Extenders as your sensing locations. Add them now to get started.
home_set_sensitivity_guide: You can't adjust sensitivity details without a compatible extender connected to the main router.
set_sensitivity_quit_guide2: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to exit without saving and return to Home?
add_allmembers_fill_members: Fill the profiles of your family
add_allmembers_set_members: Set the profiles of your family
add_allmembers_members_detail: Set up profiles for everyone living together in your home.
add_allmembers_choose_detail: This profile represents your family member. You can also edit member list > Profile
add_allmembers_addpersonal_detail: Personal Device is essential to get notified presence and absence of your members.
add_allmembers_addpersonal_guide: If you do not have a personal device for this member you can add later
add_allmembers_delete_last_detail: If you delete the last member, you'll be taken back to the previous member selection page.
add_allmembers_add: Are you sure to add {1} members in your {2}.
add_allmembers_personal_guide: Get notified for the member presence and absence.
common_session_expired_detail: Your session has expired. Please sign in again to continue.
common_connection_error_detail:
Something went wrong.
 Please check your mobile network connection status and try again.
setting_clear_cache_detail: In the Android environment, "Clear Cache" deletes data, whereas here, "Clear Cache" is a process to optimize the app.
set_sensitivity_low_guide: The higher the sensitivity, the smaller movements will be detected.
place_add_check_router: Your router has been successfully scanned using the Moni app. Please continue with the following steps.
add_allmembers_maxerror_body: You can invite up to 8 members only. Please remove an existing member to add a new one.
error_place_add_location_head: Error: Unable to Add Sensing Location
error_place_add_location_norouter: The main router is disconnected or the network connection is unstable. Please check the connection and try again.
signup_pod_addplace_mainguide: Set up a place and connect your first Moni Pod to easily keep track of your family's presence and detect motion at a glance.
signup_addplace_pod_guide: Press the WPS button to activate motion sensing.
signup_addplace_pod_guide1: Check the Moni Pod's LED status to confirm power.
place_scan_pod_guide: To seamlessly pair, scan the QR code on your Moni Pod.
place_scan_pod_network_body: This device brings the surrounding network and analyze connected devices and the network environment.
place_scan_pod_network_info1: Adjust Scan Range for Better Performance
place_scan_pod_network_info2: To hide a personal device from detection, connect it to a different Wi-Fi network than the one used by this Moni Pod.
place_scan_pod_qr_guide: Ready to pair your Moni Pod?
place_scan_pod_qr_guide1: Make sure your Moni Pod is compatible with this app and is turned on.
place_scan_pod_qr_guide2: Have the QR code on the back of your Moni Pod ready to scan.
place_scan_pod_qr_guide3: Make sure your Moni Pod’s internet status is working.
place_pod_pair_success_guide: Your Moni pod has been successfully paired with the Moni app. Enjoy the Family Care service.
sensing_pod_find_sub: This feature helps you locate your device by triggering an LED indicator from the device.
sensing_pod_control_led_sub: This feature allows you to adjust the brightness of the device's LED for optimal visibility and comfort.
sensing_pod_check_led_sub: Your Moni Pod is now signaling with LED indicators. Follow the lights to locate it easily.
place_no_pod_guide: No device found. Please check if it is connected to the same network as your Moni Pod.
sensing_pod_not_found_sub: We couldn't connect to your Moni Pod. Please check its network and power status, then try again.
sensing_pod_brightness_level_success: The Brightness level setting change is saved
create_place_sign_out_warning_guide: Are you sure you want to sign out from this page? Completing the 'Create Place' process is essential to use the Moni service.
place_already_pod_paired_guide: This Moni Pod is already registered. Please power off the current Moni Pod, then turn on the new device you wish to register and try again.
common_pod_command_loading_sub: We’re verifying the status of your Moni Pod through our server. This may take 1–2 minutes. Please wait.
place_scan_qr_permission_title: Please allow access to your camera
place_scan_qr_permission_guide: Moni needs camera access to complete this process. This access is used only when needed and does not store any images or videos.
weekreport_register_guide_body: Check its motion and member weekly trend at a glance.
weekreport_no_report_guide_title: No Weekly Report at this week!
weekreport_no_report_guide_body: Please check the below condition to generate weekly report.
weekreport_check_guide_1: Stable Connection of the main router
weekreport_check_guide_2: More than 2 days data are required to generate general trend
weekreport_check_guide_3: More than 4 days data are required to analyst its pattern with ai system
weekreport_check_guide_4: At least one sensing location and member should be included
weekreport_busy_gathering_title: I'm busy gathering lots of data!
weekreport_busy_gathering_body: We need to collect data for a week to analyze the patterns. Please hang tight!
weekreport_make_report_title: Now, we’re making a weekly report of your family
weekreport_make_report_body: We're analyzing weekly motion and presence at home, with updates every monday. Please wait!
weekreport_report_guide_body: Your past 7 days' pattern gathered from {1} has been precisely analyzed by our powerful AI system. Take a look at these AI-powered features.
weekreport_who_most_unexpected_event: Who made the most unexpected events?
weekreport_pattern_guide_title: Moni is learning the patterns of your space and its members.
weekreport_pattern_guide_body: Once a complete week’s data is collected, we’ll provide you with even more accurate insights!
weekreport_no_data_available_msg: No data available for this day.
weekreport_no_data_available_body: Data for this feature is not available for this week.
weekreport_unexpected_absence_guide: Over the past {1} days, your family experienced an average of {2} Unexpected Absences per day.
weekreport_unexpected_presence_guide: Over the past {1} days, unexpected presence was detected at abnormal times in your place.
weekreport_unexpected_motion_guide: Over the past {1} days, Some Unexpected Motions are detected when it’s abnormal time in your place.
weekreport_late_night_action_guide: Over the {1} days, your family earned an average of {2} activities a day at night.
weekreport_time_with_family_guide: Over the {1} days, your family spent an average of {2} hours per day together.
weekreport_place_empty_time_guide: Over the {1} days, your family earned an average of {2} activities a day at night
weekreport_no_unexpected_absence_this_we: No Unexpected Absence at This Week.
weekreport_no_unexpected_presence_this_w: No Unexpected Presence at This Week.
weekreport_no_unexpected_motion_this_wee: No Unexpected Motion at This Week.
add_location_maxerror_body: You have reached the maximum limit of 10 sensing locations. To add a new location, please delete an existing one and try again.
weekreport_noone_home: No one was home this week.
report_no_report_guide_title: No Daily Report for this day!
report_no_report_guide_body: Please check the below condition to generate daily report.
report_check_guide_2: More than 1 days data are required to generate daily trend
report_latenight_action_guide2: Time when motion is detected between 10 PM and 6 AM
account_delete_guide1: Deleting your account will permanently remove all Place and Member data associated with it.
account_delete_guide2: This action cannot be undone—once deleted, your account and data cannot be recovered.
account_delete_guide3: To access Motion Sensing Data again, you will need to sign up and go through the setup process from the beginning.
account_delete_success_guide: Your account and all associated data have been permanently deleted. Thank you for using Moni.
account_delete_success_popup_guide2: You can sign in with this email anymore as you’ve deleted it.
common_service_center_day:
Weekday : AM 10:00 ~ PM 05:00
Closed on weekend and public holidays
account_delete_confirm_guide: Are you sure you want to delete this account and all related data? This action cannot be undone.
alarm_emergency_guide: Press the device button to send an emergency notification.
permission_bluetooth_guide: Enable BT to pair and register your Moni Pod during setup.
create_palce_choose_how_sub: The easiest way is using WPS. if your router doesn’t support it or it’s hard to access, BT paring is available
create_palce_choose_wps_sub: Fast and automatic. Most router support this.
create_palce_choose_bt_sub: For routers without WPS or if the button is hard to press.
pod_easymesh_guide1_title: You must connect your Moni Pod to the router’s Wi-Fi network.
pod_easymesh_guide1_subtitle: Power on your mesh router and Moni Pod. Make sure they're placed close to each other.
pod_easymesh_guide2_title: Step1: Press the Router’s WPS Button.
pod_easymesh_guide2_guide: To connect the nerwork of your Moni Pod. Press your router’s WPS button first.
pod_easymesh_guide3_title: Step2: Press the Moni Pod’s WPS Button.
pod_easymesh_guide3_guide: To connect the nerwork of your Moni Pod. Press your Moni Pod’s WPS button first.
pod_easymesh_guide4_guide: During WPS, the LED flashes green. If the connection fails, it will flash red rapidly for 5 seconds.
pod_power_check_subtitle: Power on your Moni Pod, Booting might take about 1 - 2 min(s).
pod_bt_guide1_title: Step1: Turn on the BT setting of Mobile
pod_bt_guide1_guide: To start pairing, please enable BT on your mobile device. This allows Moni to find and connect to your Moni Pod nearby.
pod_bt_guide2_title: Step 2: Press the WPS Button on the Moni Pod
pod_bt_guide2_guide: Press and hold the WPS button on the top of your Moni Pod for about 3 seconds.
pod_bt_guide3_title: Step 3: Check the Moni Pod LED status
pod_bt_guide3_guide: The LED will start flashing blue when it’s ready to connect.
pod_bt_guide4_guide: When the connection is successful, the LED will turn solid green.
pod_power_check_subtitle1: Detecting Moni Pod now, it may take 1 - 2 min(s). Please wait.
pod_pod_power_ensure: Ensure your moni pod’s powere is on.
pod_bt_setting_error_sub: To register your Moni Pod and create a Place, BT must be enabled on your device. Please follow the guide below to turn it on.
pod_bt_setting_error_tunoff: BT is currently turned off. Please enable BT in your device settings to continue.
pod_bt_power_ensure: Ensure Moni Pod is powered on.
pod_bt_closed_ensure: Ensure Your phone is close to the device.
error_BT_notfound: We couldn’t find your Moni Pod. Let’s try scanning again.
pod_find_BT_sub: Your Moni Pod is ready to connect to Wi-Fi.
common_check_wifi_ready: Ensure your Wi-Fi or mobile hotspot is ready for connection.
pod_find_multiple_BT_sub: Please power on only one Moni Pod to continue the setup. You can add additional devices later from the Home screen.
pod_find_multiple_BT_sub1: Please power on only one device to continue.
wifi_select_subtitle: Select a network for your Moni Pod to connect to.
wifi_select_error_sub: There is no network to connect your moni pod.
wifi_connect_error_dialog_body: Please check the Wi-Fi name and password, then try again.
pod_b_paring_fail_sub: We couldn’t connect your Moni Pod to the selected network. Please make sure your network is stable and try again.
pod_b_paring_fail_last: If the problem persists, try selecting a different Wi-Fi or check your password.
permission_location_guide: Allow location access to detect where your device is and improve data accuracy.
pod_find_pod_title_sub: Press the WPS Button on the Moni Pod for 5 seconds
pod_permission_error_location_sub: Used to find and connect your Moni Pod accurately.
pod_permission_error_bt_sub: Required to detect and pair with your Moni Pod.
pod_bt_disconnect_error_guide: Can’t connection to nearby device. Please check and try again.
pod_find_bt_blue_led: If the LED isn't flashing blue, press the WPS button on your device.
pod_permission_error_title_sub: To continue, we need your permission to access location and nearby devices.
homebanner_motion_dectect: Motions have been detected a moment ago.
homebanner_long_no_motion: No motion for over {1}. Are you guys away?
homebanner_night_activity: Your Late Night activity was high.
homebanner_night_activity_up: Your Late Night activity increased compared to yesterday.
homebanner_night_activity_down: Your Late Night activity decreased but still high.
homebanner_activity_pattern_changed: Your activity pattern has changed quite a lot compared to yesterday.
homebanner_activity_pattern_a_bit_change: Looks like your activity today is a bit different from yesterday.
homebanner_first_no_motion: No motion has been detected so far
homebanner_no_data_all: Check your internet connection and make sure the device is turned on.
homebanner_no_data_part: One or more devices are disconnected. Check that all are turned on.
homebanner_long_motion: The peak movement period is between {1} and {2}.
common_check_wifi_password: For security, Wi-Fi networks without a password can't be added.
report_daily_motion_trend_guide: Provides a summary of overall activity. Analyze activity changes and trends compared to the previous day.
report_late_night_activity_guide: Analysis of Nighttime Activity from 10 PM to 6 AM
report_time_everyone_was_out_guide: Times when all family devices are off the network
report_week_trend_guide: Review your home's rhythm last week by comparing motion and presence patterns by day and time.
report_absence_unexpect_time: Absence detected at an unexpected time.
report_occ_unexpect_time: Occupancy detected at an unexpected time.
report_daily_insight_motion1: Motion wasn’t detected by {1} for past 24 hours. Please check Moni Pod's position and connection status.
report_daily_insight_motion2: The peak movement period is between {1} and {2}.
report_daily_insight_night_action1: Take care of your health. There were a lot of nighttime activities.
report_daily_insight_night_action2: Take care of your health. Your nighttime activity increased compared to yesterday.
report_daily_insight_night_action3: Nighttime activity decreased but still high. Take care of your health.
report_daily_insight_motion_diff1: Your activity pattern has changed quite a lot.
report_daily_insight_motion_diff2: Looks like your activity is a bit different from the previous day.
report_daily_insight_first_motion2: Activity started earlier than the previous day.
report_daily_insight_first_motion3: Activity started later than the previous day.
homebanner_assistant: Possible help signal detected by Moni Pod. Please check in at home.
homebanner_unusual_motion: Motion detected, but it doesn't match the usual pattern.
homebanner_unusual_no_motion: No motion detected when activity is usually observed.
homebanner_many_motion: A lot of activity has been detected today.
report_week_insight_night_action1: There’s been a lot of nighttime activity on this week.
report_week_insight_night_action2: Your late-night activity increased significantly compared to last week.
report_week_insight_night_action3: Your late-night activity decreased significantly compared to last week.
report_week_insight_night_action4: There was a lot of late-night activity on weekdays.
report_week_insight_night_action5: On weekdays, There was a lot of late-night activity, increased compared to the previous week.
report_week_insight_night_action6: On weekdays, There was a lot of late-night activity, decreased compared to the previous week.
report_week_insight_night_action7: There was more late-night activity onl weekend.
report_week_insight_night_action8: On weekends, There was a lot of late-night activity, increased compared to the previous week.
report_week_insight_night_action9: On weekends, There was a lot of late-night activity, decreased compared to the previous week.
report_week_first_motion: Your first motion typically occurred around {1}
report_week_insight_motion_diff1: Your home's activity pattern was significantly different last week.
report_week_insight_motion_diff2: Your home's activity pattern was a little different last week.
report_unexpected_motion: Motion detected at an unexpected time.
report_weekly_trend: Take a quick look at last week’s movement trends in your home.
report_disconnected: The period of time when the connection was lost.
report_no_data_filter: The selected event hasn't been occured on this week.
